name: Bears With Bad Hygiene
description:
Work in progress.

I'm new to programming and game development so I'm very proud that I was able to create this game. I hope you enjoy it!

If you're downloading the game on mobile devices, Keep in mind your phone will probably give you a bunch of warnings about installing apps from "unknown publishers" Just ignore those. You know me, right?

PC Controls

"A" & "D" to move.

"SPACE" to jump.

"ESC" for the pause menu

Mobile Controls

Use the gosh darn buttons!

Bears With Bad Hygiene DevLog on YouTube
